project.description: Patch FPGA image on Colossus DX 1x100G I/O Board

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_CHASSIS_IP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of Spirent TestCenter chassis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_SLOT_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Slot ID of Spirent test module (zero-based)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_FPGA_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Directory on remote chassis where FPGA image files are located, example: /mnt/spirent/testmodule/slot0/hypervisor/fpga

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_INSTALL_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Spirent TestCenter BLL/UI installation target directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "Original FPGA image version:"
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "rsh card${STC_SLOT_ID}.ccpu1 \"/usr/spirent/bin/tp 0 0\""
echo ""

echo "Copy FPGA image to remote STC chassis"
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ./colossus_100g.bit root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP}:${STC_FPGA_DIR}/colossus_100g_jenkins.bit
echo "Configure FPGA image soft-link to remote STC chassis"
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "cd ${STC_FPGA_DIR}; ln -sf colossus_100g_jenkins.bit ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/colossus_100g.bit"

echo "prepare workspace" rm -rf ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR} rm -rf ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/
echo "get Spirent TestCenter BLL artifact" #wget http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/view/integration_summary_ci/job/bll_linux/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/il/bld_bll-el3_x86/Release/bin/TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz wget -nv http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/view/integration_summary_ci/job/bll_linux_x64/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/il/bld_bll-el3-64_x86_64/Release/bin/TestCenter.Linux.x64.full.tar.gz
echo "extract application files" #tar -zxvf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz tar -zxf TestCenter.Linux.x64.full.tar.gz mv ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/ ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR}
#ls -al
echo "use API/Python/StcPython.py" #mv ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py.stak cp -f ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/API/Python/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/
echo "free up some space" rm -rf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz

echo "New FPGA image version:"
sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "rsh card${STC_SLOT_ID}.ccpu1 \"/usr/spirent/bin/tp 0 0\""
echo ""
